[00:00.00]Nice To Meet Ya - Niall Horan (奈尔·霍兰)
[00:02.86]Lyrics by：Niall Horan/Julian Bunetta/Tobias Jesso Jr./Ruth-Anne Cunningham
[00:05.72]Composed by：Niall Horan/Julian Bunetta/Tobias Jesso Jr./Ruth-Anne Cunningham
[00:08.59]I like the way you talk I like the things you wear
[00:12.83]I want your number tattooed on my arm in ink I swear
[00:17.31]'Cause when the morning comes I know you won't be there
[00:22.21]Every time I turn around you disappear
[00:34.77]I wanna blow your mind just come with me I swear
[00:39.14]I'm gonna take you somewhere warm you know j'adore la mer
[00:43.70]'Cause when the morning comes I know you won't be there

[00:08.59]我喜欢你的言谈举止 我喜欢你的穿衣打扮
